title: Hollywood Ever After
description:
Happy Endings are for fairy tales. 

Or the movies. Not for real life. 

At least, not in Claire’s life.
Even though she’s starting over, she knows better than to want too much this time. But when she falls, literally, into the strong arms of Hollywood’s ‘it’ boy Josh Wiley, Claire’s in for some surprises. Her plans for rest and relaxation are forgotten as one incredible night with Josh becomes two…And her heart begins to want him as much as her body.Will two kids, one bastard ex-husband, and Josh’s juggernaut career mean the end of their affair? Or can Claire find her happy ending after all?This retro and sexy, romance is every woman’s fantasy of insta-love with a hunky Hollywood star. Set before the age of today’s media frenzy or the pandemic (2010), Hollywood Ever After will have readers wishing for their own Hollywood ending!
Featuring a BONUS novella- Cordially Invited-
 Weddings are wonderful, joyous events- especially when the ceremony is held in one of the most beautiful European landmarks… Oh, and the wedding is a surprise. Enjoy this super short, super sweet follow up to Hollywood Ever After. You are Cordially Invited to the wedding of Miss Claire Elizabeth Collins and Mr. Joshua Bradford Wiley.
author: Sasha Summers
